title: My League wont open..........
body:
I tried to open my league client and it did not pop up I even tried running as administrator but I got no luck please help me........ :(
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
I'm glad to hear you already tried the most common fix for this, as it means we've narrowed down the potential causes by a lot! The second most-frequent cause of this is if your patcher can't reach the patching servers. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are configured for League properly.

Let me know if these steps helped.
I Fixed my problem but thank you for responding.
